columns.name: swa_uri_part
columns.comment: Concatenated with swsite.sws_user_uri, should identify the work unambiguously.

name: srcwork
comment: All RDF information about a source work is stored here, one source work per row. A source work is identified either by its ID or by the about-date pair.

columns.name: srcwork_id
columns.comment: A unique ID for each source work.

columns.name: srcwork_date
columns.comment: Extracted from RDF. The version data of the work, stored as MW timestamp.

columns.name: srcwork_title
columns.comment: Usefull or not? Intended to be some short form of about usable for listings.

columns.name: srcwork_uri_part
columns.comment: Concatenated with swsite.sws_work_uri, should identify the work unambiguously.

indexes.name: srcwork_uridate_unique
indexes.comment: Identifies the work if id not known.

columns.name: swal_srcworkid
columns.comment: The source work's ID as used in 'srcwork.srcwork_id'.

columns.name: swal_authorid
columns.comment: The source work's author's ID as used in 'swauthor.swa_id'.

columns.name: swsl_workid
columns.comment: The source work's ID as used in 'srcwork.srcwork_id'.

columns.name: swsl_sourceid
columns.comment: The source work's own source ID as used in 'srcwork.srcwork_id'.

name: revsrc
comment: This table links source works to revisions. Only the first revision of an article that is derived from a source should be linked to its source. Each revision may have more than one source work. Vice versa, one source work may be attributed by more than one revision. Each line holds one revision-source pair plus some additional info. Thus, we use 'revsrc_rs' as unique KEY.

columns.name: revsrc_revid
columns.comment: The revision's ID as used in 'revision.rev_id'.

columns.name: revsrc_srcworkid
columns.comment: The source work's ID as used in 'srcwork.srcwork_id'.

columns.name: revsrc_timestamp
columns.comment: A MW timestamp when the attribution was made.

columns.name: revsrc_user
columns.comment: The user who has made the attribution.

columns.name: revsrc_user_text
columns.comment: The user who has made the attribution.
